import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import { ReactSearchAutocomplete } from 'react-search-autocomplete' import './sell.css' function Sell() { const[ids, setIds] = useState([]) const[material, setMaterial] = useState([]) const[m_name, setMname] = useState() const[type, setSelectedType] = useState() function getAllAccountNumber(){ axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/add_account`) .then(res => { setIds(res.data) }) } function handleSelectChange(event) { setSelectedType(event.target.value); } function getMaterialName(name){ // getAllMaterial let url = `http://localhost:3000/getAllMaterial/${name}` axios.get(url) .then(res => { console.log(res.data) setMaterial(res.data) }) } useEffect(() => { getAllAccountNumber() }, []) return (
